Module jBomberman
Package controller

Class ThreadMenu

java.lang.Object
controller.ThreadDelta
controller.ThreadMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, MyJBombermanFormat
public class ThreadMenu extends ThreadDelta
The JBomberMan's Main method always start an instance of this class which will be the same in all life-cycle of the application. This class represents the code of the Thread that regulates all operations in the menus sections of the application. This thread dies only when the application is terminated.
